channel.title: VMs on 4GB RAM PC
channel.description: My PC has only 4GB RAM. Should I use kali linux with VM on my pc?? Is it okay for my pc??

item.title: VMs on 4GB RAM PC

item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 1672 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: VMs on 4GB RAM PC
item.dc:creator: wiz64
item.description:
kali is unnecessarily bloated,
You can use a Cloud VM instead with ubuntu.
If you are novice then you should try kali.
4GB is still enough, close down all browsers, allocate around 1.5
GB ram else VM would be slow, use some of graphics memory, and close all other unnecessary application, like discord.
Use brave or any other browser.

Read full topic

item.description:
I mean it’s not going to hurt it but it probably won’t run too well, considering the max you can allot is about 2 gigs
